name: It's Hip to Be Square
description: Do you like BOKiKiSOFT?  Their early work was a little too green for my tastes, but when Wild Caboose Chase came out for GMTK Jam 2021, I think they really came into their own, commercially and artistically. The whole game has a clear, crisp feel, and a new sheen of consummate professionalism that really gives the gameplay a big boost.   In '22, BOKiKiSOFT released this, It's Hip to Be Square, a game so addictive, most people probably don't read the tutorial. But they should, because the side of the player's cube that's facing up indicates the color of the bullets you can shoot, which kills that corresponding color of enemy.
